index.adminMsg: Here is the Latitude and Longitude from the database
index.msg1: Now that you have logged in, you can use the upload function of our website so share your favorite places around the world!
index.msg2: Simply go to the map and give permission to share your location, our website then will show you the latitude and longitude.
index.msg3: Once you copy them, you can click the Upload button and paste them there along with any information and a great picture you can share!!
index.please: Please Log in using the Header

dynamicmap.prompt: Do you want to enable location services?
dynamicmap.nosupport: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

uploading.sorry: Submittion Failed, You have letters inside Latitude or Longitude!
